author: SohamBhattacharya
body:
This PR fixes the usage of L1 egamma seeds in Phase-2 HLT.
See details of the fix in these [slides](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1322372/contributions/5564948/attachments/2708940/4703652/2023-09-05_HLT-upgrade-meeting.pdf#page=10).
title: [Phase-2] Fix usage of L1 egamma seeds in Phase-2 HLT
